DOC.brief_title: Revaccination With PNEUMOVAX ( TM ) 23 Older Adults ( V110-007 )
DOC.detailed_description: This study extension study ( V110-007-10 ) meet requirement post clinicaltrials.gov . The original study ( V110-007-00 ) complete 2004 meet criterion registration .
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal negative urine pregnancy test female No fever day vaccination History allergy vaccine component History pneumococcal disease Received live virus vaccination within 4 week prior study start Received inactivated vaccination within 7 day prior study start Received blood product within 5 month prior study start Participated investigational drug vaccine study past 30 day Received immunosuppressive therapy Patient immune deficiency
